metadata.title: CVE-2023-4056 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 115, Firefox ESR 115.0, Firefox ESR102.13, Thunderbird 115.0, and Thunderbird 102.13. Some of these bugsshowed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effortsome of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 102.14, and Firefox ESR< 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
